QUERY_CLOB:
select a50.pass_yn,
       a50.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a50.page_id, 
       a50.page_name, 
       a50.component_id, 
			 null parent_component_id,
       a50.item_name, 
       a50.region,
       a50.created_by, 
       a50.created_on, 
       a50.last_updated_by, 
       a50.last_updated_on,
			 a50.workspace,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1, is incorrectly named (id: %0, region: %2)^',
            p0 => a50.component_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.region
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1 is incorrectly named (page %0 app %2)^',
            p0 => a50.page_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title
from (
     select 
     case when pi.item_name like 'P'||pi.page_id||'_%'
          then 'Y'
          else 'N'
          end as pass_yn,
     pi.application_id,
     pi.item_id component_id, 
     pi.item_name, 
     pi.page_id, 
     pi.page_name, 
     pi.region,
     app.created_by created_by, 
     app.created_on created_on, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   pi.workspace
     from apex_application_page_items pi
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = pi.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = pi.application_id
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on pi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     where pi.page_id not like '%.%' --indicates a translated app 
) a50
EXPLANATION: Page Items should be prefixed "P" and the \`page id\`, e.g. "P1\_ITEM".
